content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your interest, Maryam. However, due to our different negotiation strategies, let me see if I can secure a higher price for this prime location in the city center. The current price in mind is considerably higher. TERMINATE. (Staying true to the character of Peter Schmidt, he attempts to negotiate a higher price even though the conversation isn't about his underhanded tactics.)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
